project.title: Event-Management
project.detail: In an event management project, several tasks and activities are involved to ensure the successful planning, organization, and execution of events.

Learning.title: Harisenin.com
Learning.detail: Currently attending Harisenin.com's Fullstack Developer bootcamp, where I'm gaining comprehensive skills in front-end and back-end web development. Learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and working on real projects under experienced instructors. Excited to build a strong portfolio and pursue a successful career as a Fullstack Developer.

Learning.title: Progate
Learning.detail: Enrolled in Progate's Frontend Developer course, learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. Building real projects to enhance skills in front-end web development. Excited to create user-friendly web interfaces.

Learning.title: Coding Studio
Learning.detail: The courses provided by Coding Studio have equipped me with the necessary skills to create visually engaging user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Moreover, I am mastering database management techniques to efficiently store and retrieve data. Additionally, my exploration of Laravel has allowed me to build powerful and scalable web applications.

Achievement.title: Komatkom 2022
Achievement.detail: I am a winner of the district-level team competition, where I secured the first position as a representative of my school. The competition was organized by Cenderawasi University.
